snippet.title: Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed | Release Date Reveal | Collector’s Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed will release on September 24, 2024 for PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.

Pre-order here: https://epicmickey.thqnordic.com 

Pre-order digitally now and receive a Costume Pack with 3 skins and 24 hours Early Access*. 

For the ultimate Epic Mickey fans, we are thrilled to announce that pre-orders for the Collector's Edition ($ 199.99) are now live as well! This exclusive edition is a must-have for dedicated fans and collectors alike, with limited availability. 

The Collector's Edition includes: 
- A stunning 28 cm Mickey Mouse Statue, perfect for display 
- An Oswald the Lucky Rabbit Keychain, a nod to Disney’s classic character 
- A Vintage Mickey Mouse Tin Sign, adding a touch of nostalgia 
- Six beautiful Disney Epic Mickey Postcards 
- A Collector’s Steelbook for the ultimate presentation 
- The Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed Costume Pack, for added in-game fun 

*Early Access is only available on consoles.

#EpicMickeyRebrushed
